issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: A new unit, integration or system test.
issuetype.name: Test

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: Not printing the stack trace makes debugging harder.
fields.summary: Namenode exits on exception without printing stack trace in AbstractDelegationTokenSecretManager

comments.body: Patch to print the exception stack trace

+1 for the patch.

Also attached branch-1 patch.
I will commit this to trunk and branch-2 shortly.

Slightly updated patch with two additions:
# Print the current number of tokens (we saw namenode going out of memory while creating an array in this part of the code, this will help debug it)
# Some code cleanup
Patch for branch-1.
builds.apache.org appears to be down.
